commitments.commitment: Will implement everything that the Rosen Bridge team implements

commitments.quote: any chain or network that they go ahead and implement, we will also be leveraging that

commitments.commitment: Set up for public testing in mid-July

commitments.quote: hoping to get a public release closer to the end of July for everyone to try out and work through

key_facts.fact: Rosen Bridge minimum fee is up to $10 for transactions below $2,000

key_facts.fact: Rosenport batches transactions up to $2,000 threshold
